EmailTemplate.name: Social Media Standalone - Add Service
EmailTemplate.subject: Introducing your Social Media Strategist!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Account.Primary_Contact_First_Name__c}!
I’m delighted to introduce you to [Social Media Service Owner], your dedicated social media strategist. We are so pleased that you’ve decided to continue your journey with Luxury Presence, and I can't wait to see the impact of [Social Media Service Owner]’s expertise on your brand.
[Social Media Service Owner] will reach out shortly to schedule a call to discuss your goals and start shaping a powerful social media plan tailored to your needs.
Thank you, {!User.FirstName}
